item.title: Zaros godsword
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:18, topic:254512”]This is the best Godsword I’ve seen but I’m bored of them now.

[quote author=sanga282 link=topic=336319.msg2613657#msg2613657 date=1230902719]
why do all godswords have the same look? make it look more original
[/quote]RatherNot he leeches the godsword stuff from JaGeX Ltd. right away…

Remember, if you’re going to call it a ‘godsword’ you need to keep the blade the same; as the blade of the godsword seperates from the hilt.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros godsword
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

This is the best Godsword I’ve seen but I’m bored of them now.

sanga282:

why do all godswords have the same look? make it look more original

Remember, if you’re going to call it a ‘godsword’ you need to keep the blade the same; as the blade of the godsword seperates from the hilt.

2.Try to make your models from SCRATCH and as SPECIAL you can.

item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Zillionair1, post:9, topic:254512”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=336319.msg2614615#msg2614615 date=1230956630]
at least i tried and didnt leech with my guthix gs…
[/quote] Guthix Godsword? Who made that again… GalkonsPride? SilentCJ? I knew that you didn’t![/quote]

Zillionair he did make it. joey didnt leach it. if you compared both models you would see significant differences. and joey would need to do a very deep grave dig to pick the topic out amd dl the file. you need to think about the facts before you speak.

item.title: Zaros godsword
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

didnt i say that i didnt leech…anyway silentCJ knows i didnt leech he even said it in my post -.-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2009, 01:17:31 am[/size][hr]look heres a direct quote from the thread i made

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:17, topic:254504”][quote author=Mod Whip link=topic=336305.msg2614302#msg2614302 date=1230938790]

Galkon made this ages ago.

Yeah I know really. How about we just make one topic for all the leeching noobs to post in?
[/quote]

I did not accuse him of leeching.
I’m making that final.

I simply said it had been done before by Galkon, his looks nothing like this, he did not leech.

I know joeyjoe, he’s cool, and i believe he doesn’t leech, seems like a nice guy.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

just stop with the godswords… i havent seen one in so long. i was happy tbh. im SUCK of godswords. (this hasbeen done before quite awhile back too.)

IF you want to make a godsword, make it TOTALLY custom. dont just change the little symbol. make a new blade, new hilt, new handle.
